author: slive
msg: Document the update= option for the mirror cgi script.

author: slive
msg: Update the mirrors.cgi script to allow for an update= field
to request mirrors that have updates since a particular time.
This required a change in the mirror database format (to pass
through the update time, rather than just the up-to-date flat).

author: brianb
msg: Made a change to the description of the mail server (and removed the
reference to noc@collab.net - though we do need to figure out how to
tell people to contact the infrastructure team if the mail system is
down), and the site rebuild appears to have picked up some other text
changes made in the .xml but not in the .html.

msg: Encourage them to also read about "How the ASF works".
